00002 #ifndef B3_RESIZABLE_POOL_H
00003 #define B3_RESIZABLE_POOL_H

00005 #include "Bullet3Common/b3AlignedObjectArray.h"
00006 
00007 enum 
00008 {
00009         B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_FREE=-1,
00010         B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_USED =-2
00011 };
00012 
00013 template <typename U>
00014 struct b3PoolBodyHandle : public U
00015 {
00016         B3_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00017 
00018         int m_nextFreeHandle;
00019         void setNextFree(int next)
00020         {
00021                 m_nextFreeHandle = next;
00022         }
00023         int     getNextFree() const
00024         {
00025                 return m_nextFreeHandle;
00026         }
00027 };
00028 
00029 template <typename T> 
00030 class b3ResizablePool
00031 {
00032 
00033 protected:
00034         b3AlignedObjectArray<T> m_bodyHandles;
00035         int m_numUsedHandles;                                           // number of active handles
00036         int     m_firstFreeHandle;              // free handles list
00037 
00038         T* getHandleInternal(int handle)
00039         {
00040                 return &m_bodyHandles[handle];
00041 
00042         }
00043         const T* getHandleInternal(int handle) const
00044         {
00045                 return &m_bodyHandles[handle];
00046         }
00047 
00048 public:
00049         
00050         b3ResizablePool()
00051         {
00052                 initHandles();
00053         }
00054         
00055         virtual ~b3ResizablePool()
00056         {
00057                 exitHandles();
00058         }
00060 
00061         int getNumHandles() const
00062         {
00063                 return m_bodyHandles.size();
00064         }
00065 
00066         void getUsedHandles(b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& usedHandles) const
00067         {
00068 
00069                 for (int i=0;i<m_bodyHandles.size();i++)
00070                 {
00071                         if (m_bodyHandles[i].getNextFree()==B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_USED)
00072                         {
00073                                 usedHandles.push_back(i);
00074                         }
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         
00079 
00080         T* getHandle(int handle)
00081         {
00082                 b3Assert(handle>=0);
00083                 b3Assert(handle<m_bodyHandles.size());
00084                 if ((handle<0) || (handle>=m_bodyHandles.size()))
00085                 {
00086                         return 0;
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 if (m_bodyHandles[handle].getNextFree()==B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_USED)
00090                 {
00091                         return &m_bodyHandles[handle];
00092                 }
00093                 return 0;
00094 
00095         }
00096         const T* getHandle(int handle) const
00097         {
00098                 b3Assert(handle>=0);
00099                 b3Assert(handle<m_bodyHandles.size());
00100                 if ((handle<0) || (handle>=m_bodyHandles.size()))
00101                 {
00102                         return 0;
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 if (m_bodyHandles[handle].getNextFree()==B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_USED)
00106                 {
00107                         return &m_bodyHandles[handle];
00108                 }
00109                 return 0;
00110         }
00111 
00112         void increaseHandleCapacity(int extraCapacity)
00113         {
00114                 int curCapacity = m_bodyHandles.size();
00115                 //b3Assert(curCapacity == m_numUsedHandles);
00116                 int newCapacity = curCapacity + extraCapacity;
00117                 m_bodyHandles.resize(newCapacity);
00118 
00119                 {
00120                         for (int i = curCapacity; i < newCapacity; i++)
00121                                 m_bodyHandles[i].setNextFree(i + 1);
00122 
00123 
00124                         m_bodyHandles[newCapacity - 1].setNextFree(-1);
00125                 }
00126                 m_firstFreeHandle = curCapacity;
00127         }
00128         void initHandles()
00129         {
00130                 m_numUsedHandles = 0;
00131                 m_firstFreeHandle = -1;
00132 
00133                 increaseHandleCapacity(1);
00134         }
00135 
00136         void exitHandles()
00137         {
00138                 m_bodyHandles.resize(0);
00139                 m_firstFreeHandle = -1;
00140                 m_numUsedHandles = 0;
00141         }
00142 
00143         int allocHandle()
00144         {
00145                 b3Assert(m_firstFreeHandle>=0);
00146 
00147                 int handle = m_firstFreeHandle;
00148                 m_firstFreeHandle = getHandleInternal(handle)->getNextFree();
00149                 m_numUsedHandles++;
00150 
00151                 if (m_firstFreeHandle<0)
00152                 {
00153                         //int curCapacity = m_bodyHandles.size();
00154                         int additionalCapacity= m_bodyHandles.size();
00155                         increaseHandleCapacity(additionalCapacity);
00156 
00157 
00158                         getHandleInternal(handle)->setNextFree(m_firstFreeHandle);
00159                 }
00160                 getHandleInternal(handle)->setNextFree(B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_USED);
00161                 getHandleInternal(handle)->clear();
00162                 return handle;
00163         }
00164 
00165 
00166         void freeHandle(int handle)
00167         {
00168                 b3Assert(handle >= 0);
00169 
00170                 if (m_bodyHandles[handle].getNextFree()==B3_POOL_HANDLE_TERMINAL_USED)
00171                 {
00172                         getHandleInternal(handle)->clear();
00173                         getHandleInternal(handle)->setNextFree(m_firstFreeHandle);
00174                         m_firstFreeHandle = handle;
00175                         m_numUsedHandles--;
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 };
